entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
